newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH LEAGUE FIXTURES - APRIL 18 TO 21.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ENGLISH/SCOTTISH LEAGUE FIXTURES - APRIL 18 TO 21.

text.p: English and Scottish league
soccer fixtures for April 18 to 21:
Friday, April 18:
English division one - Ipswich v Norwich.
Saturday, April 19:
English premier league - Arsenal v Blackburn, Aston Villa v
Tottenham, Chelsea v Leicester, Liverpool v Manchester United,
Middlesbrough v Sunderland, Newcastle v Derby, Nottingham Forest
v Leeds, Sheffield Wednesday v Wimbledon, Southampton v
Coventry, West Ham v Everton.
English division one - Bradford v Birmingham, Charlton v
Portsmouth, Crystal Palace v Barnsley, Grimsby v Reading,
Huddersfield v West Bromwich, Manchester City v Queens Park
Rangers, Oldham v Bolton, Oxford v Swindon, Tranmere v Sheffield
United, Wolverhampton v Southend.
English division two - Brentford v Crewe, Burnley v
Rotherham, Bury v Peterborough, Chesterfield v Millwall,
Gillingham v Blackpool, Luton v Shrewsbury, Plymouth v Walsall,
Preston v Stockport, Wrexham v Watford, Wycombe v Bournemouth,
York v Bristol City.
English division three - Barnet v Cardiff, Cambridge v
Brighton, Chester v Scarborough, Darlington v Hartlepool,
Doncaster v Fulham, Hereford v Torquay, Hull v Leyton Orient,
Lincoln v Scunthorpe, Northampton v Exeter, Swansea v Mansfield.
Scottish premier division - Hearts v Dunfermline, Kilmarnock
v Hibernian, Motherwell v Dundee United.
Scottish division one - Clydebank v Falkirk, Dundee v St
Mirren, Greenock Morton v Airdrieonians, St Johnstone v East
Fife, Stirling v Partick.
Scottish division two - Berwick v Hamilton, Clyde v Ayr,
Livingston v Dumbarton, Stenhousemuir v Queen of the South,
Stranraer v Brechin.
Scottish division three - Albion v Arbroath, Cowdenbeath v
Alloa, East Stirling v Inverness, Montrose v Queen's Park, Ross
County v Forfar.
Sunday, April 20:
English division one - Stoke v Port Vale.
English division two - Bristol Rovers v Notts County.
English division three - Wigan v Colchester, Carlisle v
Rochdale.
Scottish premier division - Celtic v Aberdeen.
Monday, April 21:
English premier league - Coventry v Arsenal.
